titleStmt.title: A poem on the most deplorable death of the Mighty Monarch, Charles II, King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland
titleStmt.author: Loyal P. E. N.
Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: by a loyal P.E.N.
Sometimes ascribed to Thomas Shadwell. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
